SELECT BC.BSNS_CLSF_CD, BC.BSNS_CLSF_CD_NM, -- 사업분류코드 BC.PROD_DST_CD, BC.PROD_DST_CD_NM, -- 상품구분코드 JAN_AMT, FEB_AMT, MAR_AMT, APR_AMT, MAY_AMT, JUN_AMT, JUL_AMT, AUG_AMT, SEP_AMT, OCT_AMT, NOV_AMT, DEC_AMT FROM ( SELECT BSNS_CLSF_CD, PROD_DST_CD, SUM(JAN_AMT) JAN_AMT, SUM(FEB_AMT) FEB_AMT, SUM(MAR_AMT) MAR_AMT, SUM(APR_AMT) APR_AMT, SUM(MAY_AMT) MAY_AMT, SUM(JUN_AMT) JUN_AMT, SUM(JUL_AMT) JUL_AMT, SUM(AUG_AMT) AUG_AMT ,SUM(SEP_AMT) SEP_AMT, SUM(OCT_AMT) OCT_AMT, SUM(NOV_AMT) NOV_AMT, SUM(DEC_AMT) DEC_AMT
FROM BRST100T -- ★조회조건 목표관리주체 : 영업부서 (사업목표조회인 경우) 2020-03-12
FROM BRST110T -- ★조회조건 목표관리주체 : 영업대표 (사업목표조회인 경우) 2020-03-12
FROM BRST100V -- ★조회조건 목표관리주체 : 영업부서 (사업예상불러오기인 경우) 2020-03-12
FROM BRST110V -- ★조회조건 목표관리주체 : 영업대표 (사업예상불러오기인 경우) 2020-03-12
WHERE CRIT_YEAR = #{year} -- ★조회조건 기준연도
AND DEPT_ID = #{slsDeptId} -- ★조회조건 하위부서 비포함, 조회조건 대상부서
AND EMP_ID = #{empId} -- ★조회조건 목표관리주체 : 영업대표일때
AND DEPT_ID IN (SELECT DEPT_ID FROM HMST110T -- ★조회조건 하위부서 포함 WHERE SELL_OCR_YN = 'Y' -- 매출발생부서 START WITH DEPT_ID = #{slsDeptId} AND CRIT_YEAR = #{year} -- ★조회조건 대상부서 CONNECT BY PRIOR DEPT_ID = HGRK_DEPT_ID AND PRIOR CRIT_YEAR = CRIT_YEAR)
AND BPLN_DST_CD = #{bplnDstCd} -- ★조회조건 사업계획구분(사업목표조회인 경우) AND BRSL_DTL_DST_CD = #{brslDtlDstCd} -- ★조회조건 실적구분(사업목표조회인 경우)
AND BRSL_DTL_DST_CD = SUBSTR(#{brslDtlDstCd} ,1,1)||'F' -- ★조회조건 실적구분(사업예상불러오기인 경우)
GROUP BY BSNS_CLSF_CD, PROD_DST_CD ) V, ( SELECT B.BSNS_SEQC, B.BSNS_CLSF_CD, B.BSNS_CLSF_CD_NM AS BSNS_CLSF_CD_NM, D.PROD_SEQC, D.PROD_DST_CD, D.PROD_DST_CD_NM --,C.BRSL_SEQC, C.BRSL_DST_CD, C.BRSL_DTL_DST_CD FROM ( SELECT SORT_SEQC AS BSNS_SEQC, BSNS_CLSF_CD, BSNS_CLSF_CD_NM FROM BRST004T WHERE CRIT_YEAR = #{year} -- ★조회조건 기준연도 ) B, ( SELECT SORT_SEQC AS PROD_SEQC, C10.COM_CD PROD_DST_CD, C10.COM_CD_NM PROD_DST_CD_NM FROM ACOM020T C20, ACOM010T C10 WHERE C20.CLMN_NM = 'PROD_DST_CD' AND C20.COM_GRP_CD = C10.COM_GRP_CD AND C10.USE_YN = 'Y' ) D ) BC WHERE BC.BSNS_CLSF_CD = V.BSNS_CLSF_CD(+) AND BC.PROD_DST_CD = V.PROD_DST_CD(+) ORDER BY BC.BSNS_SEQC, BC.PROD_SEQC

SELECT NVL(MIN(CRIT_YEAR), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY')) as MIN_CRIT_YEAR, NVL(MAX(CRIT_YEAR+1), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + (INTERVAL '1' YEAR),'YYYY')) as MAX_CRIT_YEAR FROM
BRST100T
BRST110T

SELECT H10.DEPT_SEQC, H10.DEPT_ID, H10.DEPT_NM, H10.DEPT_L1_ID AS DEPT_LVL1_ID, H10.DEPT_L1_NM AS DEPT_LVL1_NM, H10.DEPT_L2_ID AS DEPT_LVL2_ID, H10.DEPT_L2_NM AS DEPT_LVL2_NM, SUM(JAN_AMT) JAN_AMT, SUM(FEB_AMT) FEB_AMT, SUM(MAR_AMT) MAR_AMT, SUM(APR_AMT) APR_AMT, SUM(MAY_AMT) MAY_AMT, SUM(JUN_AMT) JUN_AMT, SUM(JUL_AMT) JUL_AMT, SUM(AUG_AMT) AUG_AMT ,SUM(SEP_AMT) SEP_AMT, SUM(OCT_AMT) OCT_AMT, SUM(NOV_AMT) NOV_AMT, SUM(DEC_AMT) DEC_AMT, #{brslDtlDstCd} BRSL_DTL_DST_CD FROM BRST100V V10, ( SELECT DEPT_SEQC, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NM, -- DEPT_LVL, HGRK_DEPT_ID
CASE WHEN DEPT_LVL = 1 THEN DEPT_ID ELSE SUBSTRB(DEPT_ID_PATH,2,INSTRB(DEPT_ID_PATH,'@',1,2)-2) END AS DEPT_L1_ID, CASE WHEN DEPT_LVL = 1 THEN DEPT_NM ELSE SUBSTRB(DEPT_NM_PATH,2,INSTRB(DEPT_NM_PATH,'@',1,2)-2) END AS DEPT_L1_NM, CASE WHEN DEPT_LVL < 3 THEN HGRK_DEPT_ID ELSE SUBSTRB(DEPT_ID_PATH,INSTRB(DEPT_ID_PATH,'@',1,2)+1,DECODE(DEPT_LVL,2,LENGTH(DEPT_ID_PATH),INSTRB(DEPT_ID_PATH,'@',1,3)-1)-INSTRB(DEPT_ID_PATH,'@',1,2)) END AS DEPT_L2_ID, CASE WHEN DEPT_LVL < 3 THEN HGRK_DEPT_NM ELSE SUBSTRB(DEPT_NM_PATH,INSTRB(DEPT_NM_PATH,'@',1,2)+1,DECODE(DEPT_LVL,2,LENGTH(DEPT_NM_PATH),INSTRB(DEPT_NM_PATH,'@',1,3)-1)-INSTRB(DEPT_NM_PATH,'@',1,2)) END AS DEPT_L2_NM,
#{brslDtlDstCd} BRSL_DTL_DST_CD -- ★조회조건 실적구분 FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS DEPT_SEQC, LEVEL AS DEPT_LVL, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NM, SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(DEPT_ID,'@') DEPT_ID_PATH, SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(DEPT_NM,'@') DEPT_NM_PATH, HGRK_DEPT_ID, (SELECT DEPT_NM FROM HMST110T WHERE DEPT_ID = A.HGRK_DEPT_ID AND CRIT_YEAR = #{year}) HGRK_DEPT_NM FROM HMST110T A WHERE ( SELL_OCR_YN = 'Y' AND DEPT_LVL_CD = '5' ) -- 영업팀 START WITH DEPT_ID = #{slsDeptId} AND CRIT_YEAR = #{year} --★조회조건: 영업부서, 기준연도 CONNECT BY ( PRIOR DEPT_ID = HGRK_DEPT_ID AND PRIOR CRIT_YEAR = CRIT_YEAR AND ( SELL_OCR_YN = 'Y' OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM HMST110T B --★하위에 매출부서를 포함하고 있는 조직 WHERE SELL_OCR_YN = 'Y' START WITH B.DEPT_ID = A.DEPT_ID AND CRIT_YEAR = A.CRIT_YEAR CONNECT BY PRIOR B.DEPT_ID = B.HGRK_DEPT_ID AND PRIOR CRIT_YEAR = CRIT_YEAR) ) ) ORDER SIBLINGS BY DEPT_SORT_SEQC ) ) H10 WHERE V10.CRIT_YEAR(+) = #{year} -- ★조회조건 기준연도 AND H10.DEPT_ID = V10.DEPT_ID(+) AND H10.BRSL_DTL_DST_CD = V10.BRSL_DTL_DST_CD(+) GROUP BY H10.DEPT_SEQC, H10.DEPT_ID, H10.DEPT_NM, H10.DEPT_L1_ID, H10.DEPT_L1_NM, H10.DEPT_L2_ID, H10.DEPT_L2_NM ORDER BY H10.DEPT_SEQC

SELECT H30.DEPT_SEQC, H30.DEPT_ID, H30.DEPT_NM, --, H30.DEPT_ID_PATH, H30.DEPT_NM_PATH H30.EMP_ID, IBIZ_EMP_NM(H30.EMP_ID) AS EMP_NM, -- 실적사원 #{brslDtlDstCd} BRSL_DTL_DST_CD , H30.DEPT_L1_ID AS DEPT_LVL1_ID, H30.DEPT_L1_NM AS DEPT_LVL1_NM , H30.DEPT_L2_ID AS DEPT_LVL2_ID, H30.DEPT_L2_NM AS DEPT_LVL2_NM, SUM(JAN_AMT) JAN_AMT, SUM(FEB_AMT) FEB_AMT, SUM(MAR_AMT) MAR_AMT, SUM(APR_AMT) APR_AMT, SUM(MAY_AMT) MAY_AMT, SUM(JUN_AMT) JUN_AMT, SUM(JUL_AMT) JUL_AMT, SUM(AUG_AMT) AUG_AMT ,SUM(SEP_AMT) SEP_AMT, SUM(OCT_AMT) OCT_AMT, SUM(NOV_AMT) NOV_AMT, SUM(DEC_AMT) DEC_AMT FROM BRST110V V11, ( SELECT H.DEPT_SEQC, H.DEPT_ID, H.DEPT_NM, P.EMP_ID, H.DEPT_L1_ID, H.DEPT_L1_NM , H.DEPT_L2_ID, H.DEPT_L2_NM, #{brslDtlDstCd} BRSL_DTL_DST_CD -- ★조회조건 실적구분 FROM BRST110V P, ( SELECT DEPT_SEQC, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NM, -- DEPT_LVL, HGRK_DEPT_ID
CASE WHEN DEPT_LVL = 1 THEN DEPT_ID ELSE SUBSTRB(DEPT_ID_PATH,2,INSTRB(DEPT_ID_PATH,'@',1,2)-2) END AS DEPT_L1_ID, CASE WHEN DEPT_LVL = 1 THEN DEPT_NM ELSE SUBSTRB(DEPT_NM_PATH,2,INSTRB(DEPT_NM_PATH,'@',1,2)-2) END AS DEPT_L1_NM, CASE WHEN DEPT_LVL < 3 THEN HGRK_DEPT_ID ELSE SUBSTRB(DEPT_ID_PATH,INSTRB(DEPT_ID_PATH,'@',1,2)+1,DECODE(DEPT_LVL,2,LENGTH(DEPT_ID_PATH),INSTRB(DEPT_ID_PATH,'@',1,3)-1)-INSTRB(DEPT_ID_PATH,'@',1,2)) END AS DEPT_L2_ID, CASE WHEN DEPT_LVL < 3 THEN HGRK_DEPT_NM ELSE SUBSTRB(DEPT_NM_PATH,INSTRB(DEPT_NM_PATH,'@',1,2)+1,DECODE(DEPT_LVL,2,LENGTH(DEPT_NM_PATH),INSTRB(DEPT_NM_PATH,'@',1,3)-1)-INSTRB(DEPT_NM_PATH,'@',1,2)) END AS DEPT_L2_NM
FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS DEPT_SEQC, LEVEL AS DEPT_LVL, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NM, SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(DEPT_ID,'@') DEPT_ID_PATH, SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(DEPT_NM,'@') DEPT_NM_PATH, HGRK_DEPT_ID, (SELECT DEPT_NM FROM HMST110T WHERE DEPT_ID = A.HGRK_DEPT_ID AND CRIT_YEAR = #{year}) HGRK_DEPT_NM FROM HMST110T A WHERE ( SELL_OCR_YN = 'Y' AND DEPT_LVL_CD = '5' ) -- 영업팀 START WITH DEPT_ID = #{slsDeptId} AND CRIT_YEAR = #{year} --★조회조건: 영업부서, 기준연도 CONNECT BY ( PRIOR DEPT_ID = HGRK_DEPT_ID AND PRIOR CRIT_YEAR = CRIT_YEAR AND ( SELL_OCR_YN = 'Y' OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM HMST110T B --★하위에 매출부서를 포함하고 있는 조직 WHERE SELL_OCR_YN = 'Y' START WITH B.DEPT_ID = A.DEPT_ID AND CRIT_YEAR = A.CRIT_YEAR CONNECT BY PRIOR B.DEPT_ID = B.HGRK_DEPT_ID AND PRIOR CRIT_YEAR = CRIT_YEAR) ) ) ORDER SIBLINGS BY DEPT_SORT_SEQC ) ) H WHERE P.CRIT_YEAR = #{year} -- ★조회조건 기준연도 AND P.DEPT_ID = H.DEPT_ID GROUP BY H.DEPT_SEQC, H.DEPT_ID, H.DEPT_NM, P.EMP_ID, H.DEPT_L1_ID, H.DEPT_L1_NM, H.DEPT_L2_ID, H.DEPT_L2_NM ) H30 WHERE V11.CRIT_YEAR(+) = #{year} -- ★조회조건 기준연도 AND H30.DEPT_ID = V11.DEPT_ID(+) AND H30.EMP_ID = V11.EMP_ID(+) AND H30.BRSL_DTL_DST_CD = V11.BRSL_DTL_DST_CD(+) GROUP BY H30.DEPT_SEQC, H30.DEPT_ID, H30.DEPT_NM, --H30.DEPT_ID_PATH, H30.DEPT_NM_PATH, H30.DEPT_L1_ID, H30.DEPT_L1_NM, H30.DEPT_L2_ID, H30.DEPT_L2_NM, H30.EMP_ID ORDER BY DEPT_SEQC, EMP_NM

WITH RSLT AS ( SELECT BSNS_CLSF_CD, PROD_DST_CD,#{brslDtlDstCd} BRSL_DTL_DST_CD, SUM(JAN_AMT) JAN_AMT, SUM(FEB_AMT) FEB_AMT, SUM(MAR_AMT) MAR_AMT, SUM(APR_AMT) APR_AMT, SUM(MAY_AMT) MAY_AMT, SUM(JUN_AMT) JUN_AMT, SUM(JUL_AMT) JUL_AMT, SUM(AUG_AMT) AUG_AMT ,SUM(SEP_AMT) SEP_AMT, SUM(OCT_AMT) OCT_AMT, SUM(NOV_AMT) NOV_AMT, SUM(DEC_AMT) DEC_AMT FROM ( SELECT BSNS_CLSF_CD, PROD_DST_CD,#{brslDtlDstCd} BRSL_DTL_DST_CD, SUM(JAN_AMT) JAN_AMT, SUM(FEB_AMT) FEB_AMT, SUM(MAR_AMT) MAR_AMT, SUM(APR_AMT) APR_AMT,
-- 2021년에는 공공영업3팀 5월부터 제외 CASE WHEN DEPT_ID != '3030' THEN SUM(MAY_AMT) END AS MAY_AMT, CASE WHEN DEPT_ID != '3030' THEN SUM(JUN_AMT) END AS JUN_AMT, CASE WHEN DEPT_ID != '3030' THEN SUM(JUL_AMT) END AS JUL_AMT, CASE WHEN DEPT_ID != '3030' THEN SUM(AUG_AMT) END AS AUG_AMT, CASE WHEN DEPT_ID != '3030' THEN SUM(SEP_AMT) END AS SEP_AMT, CASE WHEN DEPT_ID != '3030' THEN SUM(OCT_AMT) END AS OCT_AMT, CASE WHEN DEPT_ID != '3030' THEN SUM(NOV_AMT) END AS NOV_AMT, CASE WHEN DEPT_ID != '3030' THEN SUM(DEC_AMT) END AS DEC_AMT
SUM(MAY_AMT) AS MAY_AMT, SUM(JUN_AMT) AS JUN_AMT, SUM(JUL_AMT) AS JUL_AMT, SUM(AUG_AMT) AS AUG_AMT, SUM(SEP_AMT) AS SEP_AMT, SUM(OCT_AMT) AS OCT_AMT, SUM(NOV_AMT) AS NOV_AMT, SUM(DEC_AMT) AS DEC_AMT
FROM BRST100V WHERE CRIT_YEAR = #{year} -- ★조회조건: 기준연도 AND DEPT_ID IN (SELECT DEPT_ID FROM HMST110T WHERE SELL_OCR_YN = 'Y' -- 매출발생부서 START WITH DEPT_ID = #{slsDeptId} AND CRIT_YEAR = #{year} -- ★조회조건: 영업부서+기준연도 CONNECT BY PRIOR DEPT_ID = HGRK_DEPT_ID AND PRIOR CRIT_YEAR = CRIT_YEAR) AND BRSL_DTL_DST_CD = #{brslDtlDstCd} -- ★조회조건 실적구분 AND DEPT_ID NOT IN ('9998') GROUP BY BSNS_CLSF_CD, PROD_DST_CD, DEPT_ID ) GROUP BY BSNS_CLSF_CD, PROD_DST_CD
) SELECT BC.BSNS_CLSF_CD, BC.BSNS_CLSF_CD_NM AS BSNS_CLSF_CD_NM, -- 사업분류코드 BC.PROD_DST_CD, BC.PROD_DST_CD_NM AS PROD_DST_CD_NM, -- 상품구분코드 #{brslDtlDstCd} BRSL_DTL_DST_CD, JAN_AMT, FEB_AMT, MAR_AMT, APR_AMT, MAY_AMT, JUN_AMT, JUL_AMT, AUG_AMT, SEP_AMT, OCT_AMT, NOV_AMT, DEC_AMT FROM RSLT, (SELECT B.BSNS_SEQC, B.BSNS_CLSF_CD, B.BSNS_CLSF_CD_NM, D.PROD_SEQC, D.PROD_DST_CD, D.PROD_DST_CD_NM --,C.BRSL_SEQC, C.BRSL_DST_CD, C.BRSL_DTL_DST_CD FROM ( SELECT SORT_SEQC AS BSNS_SEQC, BSNS_CLSF_CD, BSNS_CLSF_CD_NM FROM BRST004T WHERE CRIT_YEAR = #{year} -- ★조회조건 기준연도 ) B, ( SELECT SORT_SEQC AS PROD_SEQC, C10.COM_CD PROD_DST_CD, C10.COM_CD_NM PROD_DST_CD_NM FROM ACOM020T C20, ACOM010T C10 WHERE C20.CLMN_NM = 'PROD_DST_CD' AND C20.COM_GRP_CD = C10.COM_GRP_CD AND C10.USE_YN = 'Y' ) D ) BC WHERE BC.BSNS_CLSF_CD = RSLT.BSNS_CLSF_CD(+) AND BC.PROD_DST_CD = RSLT.PROD_DST_CD(+) ORDER BY BC.BSNS_SEQC, BC.PROD_SEQC
